title: Frontend Developer
description: Develop and maintain user interfaces using React, ensuring responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility. Collaborate with backend developers on API integration.

title: Mid-Level Frontend Engineer
description: Build scalable web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Participate in code reviews and contribute to architectural decisions.

title: React Developer
description: Develop and implement UI components using React. Work with state management libraries like Redux or Context API.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Lead the development of frontend applications, mentor junior developers and ensure code quality and performance optimization.

title: Frontend UI Developer
description: Design, develop and test UI features with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and relevant frameworks. Ensure UI/UX aligns with design specifications.

title: Frontend Engineer (Mid-Level)
description: Build robust and scalable web applications with React, Angular or Vue.js. Focus on performance and user experience optimization.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Developing interactive web applications with a focus on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks. Working in an agile environment.

title: Software Engineer - Frontend
description: Develop and maintain high-quality frontend solutions using modern technologies such as React, Angular, or Vue.js. Participate in code reviews.
